description: This API is used to get mismatch in GSTR1 and GSTR3B

title: SPIKE-Save Return Compliance
description: This API is used to save return compliance data

title: View and Track Returns
description: To access the API, G2B application should first authenticate using the credentials shared and get the access token issued. Same access token to be used to access subsequent APIs. Access token will be configured to expire after 120 minutes. On expiry, same authentication API needs to be invoked to get new Access Token issued.
